name: President of the General Assembly
details: Responsible for the guiding of the GA.

name: Recreative Leader
details: Responsible for the coordination of a team composed by 30+ people that presents weekly events with an average attendance of 1000 people.

Responsible for the organization of the biggest student reception event, 'Arraial D'Engenharia 2019', in Porto overlooking several teams with a total of 100+ people that contributed to the event's success.

name: Software Engineering Intern
details: Took part in the development of an OAuth platform for personal identification (Log in with Fractal ID) with KYC/AML regulation.
Worked with Ruby on Rails, minitest, Docker, CircleCI, React, Redux, Jest, react-testing-library.
